description:
Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

Food. Groceries. And more, delivered in minutes!
From your favorite takeout to daily essentials, Ninja is the fastest 24-hour restaurants and grocery delivery service you can count on at the price you want with the variety everyone’s looking for.

Shop better. Eat better. Live better.

Start off with a reward: Love gifts? Get FREE delivery on your first order!
5,000+ Restaurants: Order your favorite cuisine and treat yourself to our daily exclusive offers. 
15,000+ products to choose from: From old favorites and household staples to new restaurants and items you never knew existed, we’ve got it all. And more!
24/7 deliveries: Whether you’re an early bird or night owl, our round-the-clock delivery service will give you what you want when you want it.  
Coffee, tea  & more: Get your daily dose of caffeine delivered and choose from our refreshingly fresh juices, sodas and more. 
Follow your order from the get-go: Track it all from the source to your front door in real time.  
Faster than you can say Ninja: We have our very own riders who’ll  deliver whatever  you order in 30 minutes (or less).
Tap into budget-friendly buys: We’ve got what you want  at the price tag you love! 
Paying is a breeze: We accept all major debit and credit cards and various other payments depending on your location. 

Your favorite cuisines delivered in minutes
5,000+ restaurants choices
Exclusive daily offers on what you crave 

One tap gets you the fastest delivery of grocery! Our diverse product range includes:

Food & drink 
►	Beverages & refreshments: Coffees, teas, juices and a range of mineral water brands.
►	Fresh foods & freshly baked: Fresh meats, poultry, fruits, veggies, bread and baked goods.
►	Dairy & frozen foods: Milk, eggs, cheese, ice creams and frozen meals.
►	Pantry supplies: Oil, flour, pasta, rice, grains and other culinary must-haves. 
►	Health-centric choices: Variety of nutritious and organic snacks, nuts, seeds and more.

Home & you 
►	Baby things: Baby formula, food and care products plus diapers, wipes and more.
►	Beauty Corner: Lenses, lashes, nails, perfumes and specialized skincare and makeup products. 
►	Home cleaning: Cleaning supplies, laundry products and other household staples.
►	Personal care: Personal hygiene, skincare and wellness products.
►	Lifestyle essentials: Electronics and mobile accessories, toys, stationary and other necessary knick knacks. 
►	Fitness center: Protein shakes and bars, gym gear, supplements and other essentials for gym bodies. 
►	Pet care: Nutritious food, toys, grooming products and more for dogs, cats and more.

We’re anywhere you are
Well, that’s the aim! Ninja launched in Saudi Arabia – covering the entire country - and has expanded  its super fast grocery delivery services to Qatar, Bahrain and soon, the  remaining GCC. The reason why we’re doing this? Like you, we like to get things done fast and right. And nothing beats getting delicious food and high-quality buys at lightning speed. 

Experience Ninja for yourself. Download the Ninja App now and get a FREE delivery on your first order!

developer: Istidamat Albarakah Information Technology Company, LLC
description:
Save Meals. Enjoy Deals. Share the Barakah

Barakah connects you with surplus meals from top restaurants, cafés, and bakeries — fresh, delicious, and up to 70% off every day!

Why You’ll Love Barakah
- Discover great meals for less.
- Follow your favorite spots and get instant updates on surplus meals nearby.
- Explore Member Experiences—see what others got, share your finds, and discover hidden gems from the Barakah community.
- Send a Gift Voucher—share blessings with friends and family, and let them enjoy a meal full of Barakah. 
- Pay easily with Apple Pay, Mada, or credit card.

How It Works
Restaurants and cafés sometimes end their day with perfectly fresh meals that just didn’t sell.
Barakah gives these meals a second chance—offering them to you at up to 70% off.
You save money, reduce waste, and enjoy good food that deserves to be shared.


Available in all major cities in KSA. 
Want to see us in your city? Follow us on social media and send us a direct message of where you would like us to come next!

Don't miss out on our 100% fresh deals! Download the app now and enjoy blessings in every bite.


Follow us for sustainability tips, new restaurants, exclusive offers, and community stories!

Instagram - @barakahapp
Twitter - @barakahapp
TikTok - @barakahapp

HungerStation – The First and Biggest Delivery App in Saudi Arabia

Whatever you need, HungerStation delivers it to you before anyone else. From your favorite restaurants, groceries, and pharmacies, to gifts and flowers. Our coverage reaches over 102 cities and regions across the Kingdom, with more than 55,000 restaurants and stores ready to serve you anytime.

Why HungerStation?
Because we’re the largest in Saudi Arabia: more than 55,000 restaurants and stores at your fingertips.

Variety that matches your cravings: whether it’s Pizza, Shawarma, Sushi, Sandwiches, Fresh Salad, Fast Food, Ice Cream, Coffee, Bakery treats, Japanese dishes, or authentic Arabic meals, you’ll always find what you’re looking for. Plus, you can enjoy international cuisines, traditional favorites, healthy options, organic products, and more.

Not just restaurants!

HungerStation Market: groceries, fresh fruits and vegetables, and cleaning products.

Pharmacies: from medicine to daily personal care.

Flowers & Gifts: want to surprise someone? Order now and we’ll deliver their gift wherever they are.

Payment your way: cash, card, or Apple Pay.

Daily deals & discounts tailored for you.

HungerStation Plus: unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants, stores, and pharmacies.

How to order? Just 4 easy steps:
1- Download the HungerStation app and set your location.
2- Choose a restaurant or store you like.
3- Browse the menu and add your favorites to the cart.
4- Order and relax, your order is on the way.

What makes us stand out?
Track your order step by step until it arrives.
Smart filters and search help you find the best restaurants and deals.
Real customer reviews to guide your choice.
24/7 customer support.
Schedule your order and get it delivered at the time that suits you.

New to HungerStation?
Enjoy a full year of unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants and stores as soon as you sign up.

HungerStation is more than just an app! It’s your shortcut to saving time and effort. Order in a few taps and rest assured, everything will arrive quickly and with quality.

Download HungerStation now.


HungerStation Before Everyone.

Welcome to HERFY’s online food ordering app. This app is HERFY’s official online food ordering app where you can explore our delicious menu with its wide range of mouth-watering burgers, sandwiches, kids meals, salads, and side orders. You can also check out our irresistible offers, enjoy ordering online whether for home-delivery or a quick pick-up from our restaurants spread all across the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, track your order, and pay in cash or by credit card. Use our branch locator in order to find the nearest HERFY restaurant to you

developer: Jahez International Information Systems Technology Company Limited Liability
description:
The Easiest and Fastest food delivery service in Saudi Arabia. 

Jahez is a Saudi app that specializes in online food delivery, and is covering more than 54 cities across Saudi. 

Your favorite meal is few steps away, when your feeling hungry just order, choose locate your address, and the receipt will show up next with the total price, you can pay seamlessly through Apple Pay or any other payment you like, Once the order is accepted you can live track it. 
Proudly the estimate delivery time is a record break 30 mins, that's because 98% of your order process is automated.

Because quality is our standard, we at Jahez are determined to provide a unique customer experience through fast delivery, payment options, continuous service developments, and the variety of restaurants.

Order and Enjoy your favorite meal through the updated ALBAIK App 

1. Download the App 

2. Select your delivery location on the map 

3. Choose the food category, then the meal from the category selected, followed by your choice of “Regular” or “Spicy” then the quantity desired. 

4. After picking your desired meals, click on the red “Confirm Order” to continue 

5. Create a new account or sign in 

5. Enter your credit card details and complete your payment. Make sure to type your name the way it appears on the card.  

6. You will receive push notifications confirming your order and with real-time status updates as we prepare your food and bring it to you.

The Chefz is the best food delivery application where you can enjoy your day. With chefz you can order from a variety of stores that include Elite restaurants, upper casual and casual restaurants, sweets, drinks, bakeries, coffee, flowers, and even perfumes delivered to your door in time.
 
If you are thinking about your favorite food for dinner, a cake for your special occasion, or flowers? Then The Chefz app is your only choice.
You can find your favorite restaurants Or, get exactly what you are craving by searching for a specific restaurant, or cuisine. Pizza. Burgers. Sushi. Pasta. Shawarma
We happily serve you in Riyadh, Eastern province, Jeddah

The Chefz app is the main exclusive sponsor of restaurants reservations in Riyadh season. We’ve created a customized UI for Riyadh season’s reservations including all zones that’s covered.
 
The chefz is a special Application for  food delivery 

• Fast delivery 
• Browse Dishes details
• Whether you need your food now or schedule it for later
• Track your Order
• View previous reviews and ratings
• Find exclusive deals from the ‘offers’ section  or Free Delivery Section that gives you access to top discounts
• Pay the way you prefer( visa, Mada, Cash on delivery, Apple pay, MasterCard).
• Send Gifts (perfumes, flower, Cake, chocolate box)

 
 
 
ذا شفز أفضل تطبيق لتوصيل ألذ خيارات الطعام، استمتع بيومك مع ذا شفز بإمكانك الطلب من متاجر مختلفة تتضمن أرقى صناع الطعام الفاخر، مطاعم متنوعة و مميزة ،  ألذ الحلويات و المخبوزات وايضاً الورود والعطور  تصل الى باب منزلك في الوقت المحدد 
 
ذا شفز هو خيارك الوحيد لأكلتك المفضلة او كيكة لمناسباتك المميزة أو حتى ورود  
في ذا شفز ستجد مطعمك المفضل والحصول على ما تريده بالبحث من خلال تصنيف معين مثل: الإيطالي برجر، اسيوي، شاورما والكثير من الخيارات   
 سعيدين بخدمتكم في الرياض، المنطقة الشرقية، جدة  
ذا شفز تطبيق مميز وخيارك الأول لتطبيق توصيل الطعام
 ذا شفز هو الشريك الرسمي لحجوزات مطاعم موسم الرياض 



• أسرع تطبيق توصيل طعام
• سهولة تصفح معلومات الأطباق
• إذا كنت بحاجة إلى طعامك الآن أو جدولته لوقت لاحق
• يمكنك تتبع طلبك
• معاينة التعليقات والتقييم من عملاء سابقين
• ستجد أفضل خيارات العروض الحصرية من قسم "العروض" أو قسم التوصيل المجاني 
• ادفع بالطريقة التي تفضلها (فيزا، مدى، نقدًا عند الاستلام، أبل باي، ماستركارد).
• يمكنك بسهولة إرسال هدايا (عطور، ورد، كيك، علبة شوكولاتة)

The fastest delivery in the Kingdom for food, groceries, gifts, flowers & more.

Hungry? Need groceries or a last-minute gift? ToYou has you covered. 
Order from top restaurants like McDonald's, Albaik, and Starbucks, or get groceries, flowers, and more delivered fast – all in one super app.

Why ToYou?

- All-in-One Delivery Solution – thousands of merchants covering all your needs across the Kingdom.
- Secure & Flexible Payments – Credit card, Apple Pay, ToYou Wallet, or pay later with Tabby & Tamara.
- Real-Time Order Tracking – Track your order live with Google Maps. 
- Exclusive Deals & Promotions – Enjoy cashback & discounts on food, drinks, and more.
- Thousands of Merchants – Order everything you desire from over +27К merchants.

Download ToYou today and benefit from our new users' offer:
30 Days of free delivery + 50 SAR credit in your Wallet.

We deliver all that matters.

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.
We have launched a new application to make ordering easier for you and to improve your overall experience. Download this app for exclusive offers!

- Collect your points and win rewards from all of your favorite stores, in one place!
- Rate your visit and provide your feedback to store management directly.
- Explore our partner network for exclusive offers & gift cards, and gift you friends.

Requeue is an app that allows you to easily add your name to the waiting list of your favorite restaurants from anywhere.

- Easily browse your favorite restaurants for an accurate waiting list
- Add your name to any list and avoid the wait
- Receive notifications when your turn is up

تطبيق ريكيو لحجز دورك في قوائم انتظار المطاعم لتوفير الوقت والمجهود

-استعراض المطاعم المفضلة لديك لقائمة الانتظار دقيقة
-إضافة اسمك إلى أي قائمة وتجنب الانتظار
-تلقي اشعارات عند اقتراب دورك


Terms of Use: https://requeue.net/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://requeue.net/Privacy-Policy
Support: https://requeue.net

Mrsool is one of the largest delivery platforms in the kingdom. Mrsool is a unique on-demand experience earned the highest user ratings among all the other large delivery apps. It’s the first and the best Saudi App that delivers everything from all types of stores and restaurants across, covers all areas in the kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Mrsools’ services expansion reached to Egypt and Bahrain and soon to other countries in the region.

Mrsool is not just a delivery app that deliver orders, Mrsool is like your brother that is always close to you no matter what you order. It does not only deliver food from all restaurants, it’s also deliver Gaz, Water, Car parts, Groceries, clothes, Accessories and even if you forgot something somewhere you can ask Mrsool to bring it to your place.   

Mrsool Advantages:
-	Delivers Everything.
-	Send whatever you want to any place.
-	Use Mrsool ordering bot for easier order process.
-	You can review your old orders and re-order them with just a click.
-	You can order from multiple places in the same order.
-	Covers all restaurants and stores in KSA.
-	Always has offers and promotions available.
-	Pay the way you prefer.
-	Live and direct chat with the driver.
-	Accept the delivery fee you want.

And if you want to earn extra money, Join Mrsool and start delivering orders.

The all new KFC Saudi Arabia App is the fastest way to order your favorite KFC fried chicken online. Ordering food online within a few clicks has never been so easy. Pick up the food or get it delivered at your doorstep, in just a few taps from the latest KFC online food ordering app!


At KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared good food and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favorite chicken available, right from the convenience of your home.


*Get started and order in minimum steps: 
 
1. Download the KFC KSA app,
2. Select a preferred mode of language,
3. Check your favorite items from easy to navigate menu,
4. Add goodness to your cart,
5. Easy Log in to use saved addresses or continue as Guest,
6. Choose your preferred mode of ordering as takeaway or delivery,
7. Select location and provide a delivery address,
8. Hassle free proceed to check out and make payment,
9. Track your order and get it delivered at lightning-fast delivery,
10. Time to enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep. 

Why you should use KFC App:

Takeaway:
While you are out and about in the city, takeaway your delicious food from any nearest KFC KSA restaurant by ordering from the food delivery app.   

 Smart Car Hop:                                                                                                                                        Experience 100% Contactless and hassle-free Car Hop services. For our customers we bring the safest contactless delivery for your car parked in our premises.

Midnight delivery:
Bookmark our KFC KSA chicken restaurant for all the late-night cravings. Have a look at our KFC menu & we will rush to you with delicious burger meals even at midnight. This is available at select locations only.

My Account:
Why spend time on multiple apps when a single app can sort you in many ways. Follow our login process which now can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook or Apple account to login with ease.

Easy payments:
With multiple payment options (including Cash on Delivery, Online payments like Credit/Debit Cards etc.) at your fingertips, it is now hassle free to pay for your order.

Exclusive KFC Menu: 
Order from the wide range of - KFC bucket meals, Wraps, Zinger box meals, twister burgers, Combos for one or for sharing, chicken fillet sandwiches and much more. Do not forget to look for our crispy chicken strips and more options from our Sides & Desserts section. 

Amazing Offers: 
Coupons, Offers & deals customized only for you so that it leaves you wanting for more. Get special rewards on the KFC deals app with your order. 

Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help you! Call us at 920021111 For more details, please log into https://www.saudi.kfc.me/en/home

تسوق بضغطة زر، من السوبرماركت لبابك

‏‎شراء المقاضي لم يكن يوماً بهذه السهولة. سهولة استخدام تطبيقنا تمكنكم من شراء المقاضي بضغطة زر. وفروا أوقاتكم من خلال طلب المواد الغذائية والمنزلية أون لاين من بنده و هايبر بنده وفي أي وقت وسيقوم متسوقكم الخاص بجمعها لكم وتوصيلها من السوبرماركت لبابك.

‏Now shop with a click!

‏Grocery shopping has never been easier. With our user friendly mobile app, you can now shop your home essentials with a click. Save time by ordering groceries and your home essentials from Panda or Hyper Panda, any time, and a personal shopper will deliver from store, to your door.

‏‎‫توفر الخدمة والتغطية ---‬ ---

‏‎قائمة التسوق والمشاركة متوفرة في جميع المناطق والتوصيل متوفر حالياً في الرياض وجدة ومكة المكرمة والمدينة المنورة والطائف وينبع والخبر والظهران والدمام والجبيل والاحساء وبريدة وعنيزة والخرج وابها وخميس مشيط وآحد رفيدة وجازان وحائل وتبوك

‏--- Service Coverage ---

‏Shopping list and sharing is available to all areas while delivery is currently available in Riyadh, Jeddah, Makkah, Madinah, Taif, Yabou, Khobar, Dhahran, Dammam, Jubail, Hassa, Buraidah, Onizah, Kharj, Abha, Khamis Mushait, Ohod Rofaidah, Jazan, Hail and Tabuk

‏‎‫الفوائد والمميزات ---‬ ---

‏‎‫- واجهة صديقة وسهولة التصفح‬
‏‎‫- أوقات توصيل مرنة‬
‏‎‫- تصفحوا الكثير من المنتجات التي تلبي كافة احتياجاتكم وتزيد بشكل اسبوعي‬
‏‎‫- حفظ المنتجات المفضلة لديكم في قوائم خاصة، كما يمكنكم الطلب حسب الوصفات والطبخات‬
‏‎‫- إضافة ملاحظات على المنتجات ليستخدمها المتسوق الخاص عند اختيار منتجاتكم‬
‏‎‫- إذا لم تجدوا منتج ضمن الموقع يمكنكم دائما عمل طلب خاص وإضافته لعربة التسوق وسيقوم المتسوق بإحضاره لكم‬
‏‎‫- عرض الطلبيات والمشتروات السابقة وإمكانية إعادة شرائها كلها أو جزه منها بضغطة زر.‬
‏‎‫- متوفر باللغتين العربية والإنجليزية‬
‏‎‫- يمكنكم رؤية المنتجات بصور عالية الوضوح وقراءة المحتويات والقيمة الغذائية‬
‏‎‫- تحديد العنوان بشكل آلي وسهل‬
‏‎‫- دفع آمن عن طريق البطاقة الإئتمانية‬
‏‎‫- إضافة المنتجات مباشرة عن طريق مسح رقم الباركود الموجود على المنتج‬


‏--- Benefits & Features ---

‏- Friendly interface and easy navigation
‏- Flexible delivery time.
‏- A big selection of products for you to choose from, and growing.
‏- Keep lists of your favorite products and shop by recipes.
‏- Add notes to your personal shopper on any particular item.
‏- If you can’t find an item you want in our list, simple add a special request and we will get it for you.
‏- View previous orders and fully or partially reorder them again with a click of a button.
‏- Available in Arabic and English
‏- View high resolution images of products and see nutrition facts and content.
‏- Easy address locator
‏- Secure online payment
‏- Add products to your list by scanning the product barcode

‏‎‫الإستئذان للصلاحيات ---‬ ---

‏‎‫تحديد الموقع: نستأذن لطلب الموقع لنسهل عليكم تحديد موقع التوصيل دون أن نزعجكم بأخذ الوصف عن طريق الهاتف.‬

‏‎‫الكاميرا والصور: نوفر عليكم وقت البحث أو الكتابة من خلال استخدام الكاميرا في مسح رقم الباركود عن المنتجات أو إضافة صور للطلبات الخاصة.‬

‏‎إرسال التنبيهات: لخدمتكم بشكل أفضل، نرغب بإرسال تنبيهات خاصة بحالة طلباتكم والعروض.

‏‎‫اسم المستخدم: حتى تتمكنوا من التسجيل السريع عن طريق برامج التواصل الإجتماعي، كما تسهل عليكم مشاركة الرمز الخاص بالتخفيض لأفراد عائلتكم وأصدقائكم وكسب قيم إضافية مجانية.‬

‏--- Permissions ---

‏- Location: It helps us locate your delivery address without the need to bother you and call for direction.

‏- Camera and Photos: We save you time by scanning products barcode using your camera, it also help you add images of special requests.

‏- Notifications: To serve you better, we would like to send you notifications related to your order status and offers.

‏- Identity: It help you register quickly and share your promotion code on social media and earn more money.

Download the KUDU app now and enjoy a faster, easier way to order your favorite meals!

KUDU Saudi restaurant App makes food ordering convenient, quick, and rewarding. Whether at home, on the go, or dining in, KUDU provides a seamless food ordering experience that enables you to enjoy your favorite meals in a few clicks.

With a user-friendly interface, the KUDU app allows you to see the whole food menu, including new at KUDU, customize your order, and complete your purchase with convenience. Choose from various ordering options, including home delivery, in-store pickup, car pickup, or dine-in, and enjoy your favorite KUDU meal conveniently whenever and wherever you want.

Key Features:


1. Easy and Convenient Ordering
    •	Discover the food menu, which includes breakfast, desserts, sandwiches, and more, with clear images and descriptions and calorie information.
    •	Customize your meal according to your taste from serval options from the KUDU menu.
    •	Add your items to the cart and preview your order prior to checkout.


2. Various Ordering Options
    •	Delivery: Order from KUDU and Get your favorite dishes delivered right to your door.
    •	In-Store Pickup: Order using the app and collect at your closest KUDU restaurant.
    •	Car Pickup: Remain in your vehicle and receive your order without going inside.
    •	Dine-In: Order in advance and have your meal at a KUDU restaurant without having to wait in line.


3. Secure and Easy Payment Options
    •	Pay conveniently using various payment methods.
    •	Enjoy a fast and hassle-free checkout process when ordering food through KUDU app.


4. KUDU Rewards – Earn Points on Every Order
    •	By registering on the KUDU app, you are automatically enrolled in KUDU Rewards, our loyalty program which enables you to earn points on every order.
    •	Earn 10 KUDU points for every Riyal spent on home delivery ordering through the app.
    •	Earn 20 KUDU points for every Riyal spent when using the app for in-store pickup, car pickup, or dine-in and scanning your loyalty QR code.
    •	Redeem points for discounts and exclusive rewards.


5. Exclusive Offers and Promotions
    •	Get access to the best fast-food deals and enjoy special offers and KUDU app-only discounts.
    •	Receive personalized promotions based on your preferences and ordering history.

7. Personalized Experience

    •	Access your account, view your points, and view past orders using KUDU app.

The Starbucks KSA App is the easiest way for you to order ahead for pickup and earn Stars every time you purchase your Starbucks favourites - beverage, food, coffee-at-home products, and merchandise at our stores or in-app*.

With every purchase in-app or in-store of your favourite Starbucks food, beverages and Starbucks® merchandise, watch Stars add up towards Free Drinks and special benefits. Get exclusive Rewards member offers sent directly to your inbox. Conveniently find your nearest Starbucks store and view your transaction history with just a tap.

Enhance your Starbucks experience, all on your Starbucks KSA app.

Getting rewarded with Stars is super easy. Here’s how you can get started:

• Download the Starbucks KSA app and register
• When in store, Scan the QR code on your app every time you make a purchase at any participating Starbucks store in KSA to collect Stars; you get 4 Stars for every 10 SAR spent!
• View your collected Stars on the home screen of your app
• Redeem Stars across 5 different tiers of Rewards, including drinks, food, and merchandise, starting from 150 Stars.
• More Stars unlock the world of Gold Membership, with free birthday drink and premium offers galore.

Skip the queues and order ahead directly from the App
• Select your store of choice
• Choose your menu items
• Customise to your liking
• Pay on the app and checkout
• Head on to your chosen store and pick up your order
• Collecting Stars? Don’t worry Rewards are built in, so you’ll earn Stars with every purchase

Don’t miss out, be a part of the Starbucks coffee club – Download the Starbucks KSA app now!
* Starbucks KSA app is available for use only at participating Starbucks Stores across KSA.

جوعان ومالك خلق تصف طابور عند الكاشير وتبي طلبك يوصلك إلى عندك
الزين كله عندنا المندي والمظبي والقرصان والحلا وكل الأكل اللي يحبه قلبك
 
وفرنا لك تطبيق بتحديثات عصرية عشان نخدمك ونقدم لك ألذ الطعام اللي تميزنا بتقديمه طوال شراكتنا معك
 
المهم مالك في الطويلة
أطلب كل اللي تشتهية نفسك ولا تشيل هم التوصيل وزحمة الطرق
اتبع هالخطوات بسهولة وأزهلها : 
 
- اختر طريقة الطلب أو تصفح قائمة الطعام
- حدد موقعك أو اختر الفرع في حال الاستلام من الفرع
- اختر من قائمة الطعام ما لذ وطاب واضفها للسلة
- راجع طلبك وتأكد إن الوضع تمام وإن ما فيه عرض فاتك أو أكله نفسك تضيفها لطلبك
-  اتمم الطلب وتابع خطوات تحضير طلبك
 
وبعد ما يوصلك الأكل اضرب بالخمس ووسع صدرك 
وأكل الرومانسية كفيل أنه يضبط نفسيتك 
واحنا بخدمتك دائماً في حال وجود أي ملاحظة شاركنا تقييمك

Calo takes the guesswork out of healthy eating by analyzing your nutritional needs through our nutritionist-approved algorithm, then matching you with chef-crafted meals tailored to your body, fitness goals, and taste preferences. Fast & Fresh: Your meals are freshly prepared and ready within 2 hours, delivered daily for ultimate convenience. Goal-Driven Nutrition: Whether you’re looking to lose weight, maintain, or build muscle, Calo provides the perfect balance of macros and flavours to keep you on track. Total Flexibility: Pause, swap meals, or adjust your daily calories anytime—your plan, your way. Smart Integration: Sync with your health apps to track progress effortlessly. With HealthKit integration, Calo uses your fitness activity to fine-tune meal predictions, ensuring you get the most suitable, performance-driven meals every time.
Healthy eating has never been easier. Let Calo fuel your goals—deliciously and effortlessly.

BARN's is the first contemporary, yet fully home-grown, specialty coffee brand in Saudi Arabia.
Each cup has a story, standing through thick and thin, BARN’s has witnessed progression within the Kingdom and marked its presence as the first coffee shop drive-thru and one of the first local coffee brands.
BARN’s offers you seamless order experience with curbside, delivery and pick up. In addition to ready-to-consume beverages, BARN’s also offers various products in selected locations including coffee beans and accessories.
BARN’s currently serves coffee lovers across KSA in Jeddah, Riyadh, Makkah, Medinah,.......... The app uses your location to show you nearest branches, offering in-app wallet and exciting promotions..


- BARN’s On-the-Go:
Our pickup option allows you to pick your favorite beverages on the go from any of your preferred branches. Our barista serves your order to you at the perfect temperature, you also have the option to enjoy with your order by the curbside..


Coffee to Connect
BARN's is your Imagination of joyous day out, the idea that wants you get out of bed and start connecting. Our Coffee is a standing point to that.
Coffee to Passion
From suppliers of the finest quality beans to the right roasting and brewing, for us it's about doing It right to give you the apt idea of what passion is like in a cup.
Coffee to Taste
The warm tickle to your taste bud, the perfect aroma and the bright taste. With quality comes a lasting sip that makes you want it again and again. Barn's is about the right taste.
- BARN’s Wallet:
Top up your wallet via card or at any BARN’s branch for contactless payments and use it to pay for your orders.


Convenient Payment Options:
You can use your BARN’s wallet (recommended), your credit/debit card or Apple Pay. We offer multiple payment options to make your experience smooth, seamless and convenient.


- Map View:
BARN’s app understands how important coffee is to you. This is why we show you the nearest branches first, so that you can choose your closest neighborhood Barista for a quick caffeine rush.

في تانيا الجودة ليست فقط طريقة عملنا أو أسلوب نتبعه بل هي إيمان داخلنا بأساس كل عملية نقوم بها. إنها المبدأ الجامع الذي ننتهجه في كل مجالاتنا من التعبأة، التغليف، الزجاجات، النقل، التوزيع وخدمة احتياجات عملائنا. تهدف تانيا للمياه أن تكون «الخيار الأول» في فئة المياه المعبأة في السعودية. 
لا تنتهي القصة هنا فقد قمنا بتطوير تطبيق الجوال والذي يقدم لكم المميزات التالية:
امكانية طلب عبوات المياه المختلفة المقدمة من تانيا لتصلك في الوقت والمكان المناسبين لك في ثلاث خطوات بسيطة: اختر طلبك، حدد تفاصيل الطلب، ثم تابع تقدُّم الطلب حتى يصلك!
امكانية اضافة عناوين مفضلة لتوصيل المياه إليك عند الطلب
عرض قائمة بالطلبات السابقة ومتابعة الطلبات الحالية
استلام تنبيهات عند تغيّر حالة الطلب
يوفر التطبيق طرق دفع سلسة ومريحة لتناسب الجميع: كاش، سداد أو البطاقة الائتمانية. وكذلك من خلال رصيد تانيا!
إمكانية الحصول على نقاط رصيد من تانيا ليتم استخدامها لاحقاً كطريقة للدفع
إمكانية التواصل المباشر مع خدمة العملاء في تانيا من خلال إرسال شكاوى أو مقترحات
يدعم التطبيق اللغتين العربية والانجليزية

الفئات التي يخدمها التطبيق
يخدم التطبيق جميع المستخدمين بالأعمار المختلفة حيث يمكنهم الطلب المباشر من شركة تانيا للمياه

كيفية استخدام التطبيق
يحتاج التطبيق الى تسجيل أولاً عن طريق إدخال بيانات المستخدم حتى يمكنه لاحقاً استخدامها في الحصول على طلبه من مياه تانيا
يتطلب التطبيق الاطلاع على موقع المستخدم لعرض المنتجات المتاحة حسب مكان المستخدم كما يوفر إمكانية تجاهل استخدام الـ GPS  عن طريق إدخال العنوان يدوياً
يتطلب التطبيق الوصول إلى معلومات الرسائل الخاصة بك وذلك لإرسال كود التفعيل للتحقق من رقم الهاتف الخاص بك والذي يعد الوسيلة المستخدمة للتسجيل في تطبيق تانيا

نسعد دائماً بسماع آرائكم والتي هي محل تقدير كبير من قبلنا. برجاء إرسال تعليقاتكم القيمة واقتراحاتكم على care@tania.sa
كما يسعدنا أيضاً تقييمكم للتطبيق.

Our essence culminates form a basic fact of life: Life is a Gift! So, let’s enjoy this gift together by exploring new and exciting opportunities to celebrate life! At Tania, we ensure that all these elements are incorporated in all aspects of our services and behavior and that they are the guiding principles of how Tania strives to interact with you. This is why we have created this mobile app for your comfort and happiness.

Application Features
Order any of the different water packages provided by Tania in three easy steps: Pick your order, specify its details, and then check its status until it is delivered to your doorsteps!
Add your own list of preferred addresses to deliver water to you upon request
View the history of old orders and track the status of new ones
Receive notifications about the status and updates of your order
The application provides easy and convenient payment methods for everyone: Cash, SADAD and credit card. You can also pay for your orders using Tania balance!
Request Tania credit for later use as a payment method
Get in contact with the customer service in Tania for any complaints or suggestions you have
The application is available in both Arabic and English
Who is it For?
Water is for everyone! Likewise, you are welcome to enjoy our app and services.

How to use the application
Register by keying in your personal data which will be later used for order fulfillment
Tania application requires access to your location via GPS to view the provided items by Tania according to your location. It is also possible to ignore the use of GPS by manually entering your address
Tania application requires access to your cellphone SMS in order to send the activation code to verify your phone number, which is required for the registration in Tania application.
We are always glad to hear back from you. Your valuable comments and suggestions at care@tania.sa will be highly appreciated.

Please take a few minutes to review the application for support
